subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Serena Williams twice lost five games in a row but finished with a flourish to beat No. 17-seeded Zheng Jie, 7-5, 5-7, 6-3, in the Sony Ericsson in Key Biscayne, Fla. Also reaching the final eight was No. 5-seeded Venus Williams, who staged her own narrow escape to beat Agnieszka Radwanska, 4-6, 6-1, 6-4. The Williams sisters could renew their sibling rivalry in the semifinals Thursday.
